steps.title: Check Responsiveness
steps.description: Tap the person and call out to see if they respond.

steps.title: Call Emergency Help
steps.description: If unresponsive, immediately call the emergency number (or shout for someone to call).

steps.title: Check Breathing (Quickly)
steps.description: Look for normal breathing for no more than 10 seconds.

steps.title: Start Chest Compressions
steps.description: Place hands in the center of the chest and press hard and fast.

steps.title: Give Rescue Breaths (If Trained)
steps.description: After 30 compressions, give 2 breaths using head-tilt/chin-lift.
